Title: The Man Behind the Glass
Plot: Ronette is attacked in her hospital bed by an unseen person.  Jean Reanult, brother of Jaqcues and Bernard, plans to blackmail Ben Horne for the release of Audrey.  Donna meets with Harold Smith, a shut-in who had befriended Laura.  Albert and Truman have a strange confrontation.  Lucy reveals that there's been another man in her life, Dick Treymane (Horne's Department Store, Men's Fashions).  Shelly decides not to testify against Leo. Leland offers a clue in the search for Killer Bob.  The One-
GuestStars: Galyn Gorg, Mak Takano, Walter Olkewicz, Jennifer Aquino
